source.sqlReaderQuery:
select ZSTATUS as STS from [dbo].[Ztgr]
where id = 1

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		RevisionNumber as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		DueDate as timestamp,
		ShipDate as timestamp,
		Status as integer,
		OnlineOrderFlag as boolean,
		SalesOrderNumber as string,
		PurchaseOrderNumber as string,
		AccountNumber as string,
		CustomerID as integer,
		ShipToAddressID as integer,
		BillToAddressID as integer,
		ShipMethod as string,
		CreditCardApprovalCode as string,
		SubTotal as decimal(19,4),
		TaxAmt as decimal(19,4),
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		TotalDue as decimal(19,4),
		Comment as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SaleordHdr
source(output(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		SalesOrderDetailID as integer,
		OrderQty as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		UnitPriceDiscount as decimal(19,4),
		LineTotal as decimal(38,6),
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SaleOrdItem
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Product
SaleordHdr, SaleOrdItem join(SaleordHdr@SalesOrderID == SaleOrdItem@SalesOrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
SaleOrdItem, Product join(SaleOrdItem@ProductID == Product@ProductID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join1 derive(Year = year(OrderDate),
		Month = month(OrderDate)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 aggregate(groupBy(CustomerID,
		Year,
		Month,
		ProductID),
	TotalAmt = sum(SubTotal),
		TotalTax = sum(TaxAmt)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	stageInsert: true) ~> sink1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['SalesFact.txt'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink2
Join2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	stageInsert: true) ~> sink3

source(output(
		OrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		OrderDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		OrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		OrderDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> LKPTABLE
LKPTABLE select(mapColumn(
		LKP_OrderID = OrderID,
		LKP_CustomerID = CustomerID,
		LKP_Freight = Freight,
		LKP_OrderDate = OrderDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
source1, Select1 lookup(OrderID == LKP_OrderID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 filter(isNull(LKP_OrderID)) ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		OrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		OrderDate as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		OrderID,
		CustomerID,
		Freight,
		OrderDate
	)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		RevisionNumber as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		DueDate as timestamp,
		ShipDate as timestamp,
		Status as integer,
		OnlineOrderFlag as boolean,
		SalesOrderNumber as string,
		PurchaseOrderNumber as string,
		AccountNumber as string,
		CustomerID as integer,
		ShipToAddressID as integer,
		BillToAddressID as integer,
		ShipMethod as string,
		CreditCardApprovalCode as string,
		SubTotal as decimal(19,4),
		TaxAmt as decimal(19,4),
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		TotalDue as decimal(19,4),
		Comment as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SaleordHdr
SaleordHdr derive(Year = year(OrderDate),
		Month = month(OrderDate)) ~> YearMonth
YearMonth aggregate(groupBy(CustomerID,
		Year,
		Month),
	TotalAmount = sum(SubTotal),
		TotalFreight = sum(Freight),
		TotalTax = sum(TaxAmt),
		TotalDue = sum(TotalDue)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	stageInsert: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		Name as string,
		Mobile as string,
		Boolean as boolean,
		Pets as string[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'singleDocument') ~> source1
source1 foldDown(unroll(Pets, Pets),
	mapColumn(
		Name,
		Mobile,
		Boolean,
		Pets
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		Employeeid as integer,
		Name as string,
		DEPT as string,
		STARTDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		Employeeid as integer,
		Name as string,
		DEPT as string,
		ACTIVE as integer,
		STARTDate as date,
		ENDDATEDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source1 derive(HASHKEY_INPUT = md5(Name,DEPT)) ~> DerivedColumn1
source2 derive(Hash_Tablekey = md5(Name,DEPT)) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn1, DerivedColumn2 exists(HASHKEY_INPUT == Hash_Tablekey,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1 derive(ACTIVE = 1,
		ENDDATEDate = toDate('9999-12-31')) ~> SetoActive
DerivedColumn2, SetoActive exists(source2@Employeeid == source1@Employeeid
	&& source2@Name == source1@Name,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists2
Exists2 derive(ENDDATEDate = toDate(currentUTC()),
		ACTIVE = 0) ~> DerivedColumn3
DerivedColumn3 alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
SetoActive sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Employeeid as integer,
		Name as string,
		DEPT as string,
		ACTIVE as integer,
		STARTDate as date,
		ENDDATEDate as date
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Employeeid,
		Name,
		DEPT,
		ACTIVE,
		STARTDate,
		ENDDATEDate
	)) ~> sink1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Employeeid as integer,
		Name as string,
		DEPT as string,
		ACTIVE as integer,
		STARTDate as date,
		ENDDATEDate as date
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Employeeid','Name','DEPT'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Employeeid,
		Name,
		DEPT,
		ACTIVE,
		STARTDate,
		ENDDATEDate
	)) ~> sink2

source(output(
		OrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		OrderDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SaleOrdSrc
SaleOrdSrc alterRow(deleteIf(isNull(OrderID)),
	upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		OrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		OrderDate as timestamp
	),
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['OrderID'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		OrderID,
		CustomerID,
		Freight,
		OrderDate
	)) ~> sink1

source(output(

		NameStyle as boolean,
		Title as string,

	),

	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,

source(output(
		OrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		OrderDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',

	validateSchema: false,

		OrderID as integer,

		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		OrderDate as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,

	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,

	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,

source(output(
		Root as ({@xmlns} as string, {@xmlns:xsi} as string, {@xsi:schemaLocation} as string, catalog as (book as ({@id} as string, author as string, genre as string, price as double, publish_date as date, title as string)[]))
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'test',
	validationMode: 'none',
	namespaces: false) ~> source1
source1 foldDown(unroll(Root.catalog.book),
	mapColumn(
		{@xmlns} = Root.{@xmlns},
		{@xmlns:xsi} = Root.{@xmlns:xsi},
		{@xsi:schemaLocation} = Root.{@xsi:schemaLocation},
		{@id} = Root.catalog.book.{@id},
		author = Root.catalog.book.author,
		genre = Root.catalog.book.genre,
		price = Root.catalog.book.price,
		publish_date = Root.catalog.book.publish_date,
		title = Root.catalog.book.title
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		{@xmlns},
		{@xmlns:xsi},
		{@xsi:schemaLocation},
		{@id},
		author,
		genre,
		price,
		publish_date,
		title
	)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		{urn:Test.Namespace,Root} as ({urn:Test.Namespace,catalog} as ({urn:Test.Namespace,book} as ({@id} as string, {urn:Test.Namespace,author} as string, {urn:Test.Namespace,genre} as string, {urn:Test.Namespace,price} as double, {urn:Test.Namespace,publish_date} as date, {urn:Test.Namespace,title} as string)[]))
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	validationMode: 'none',
	namespaces: true) ~> source1
source1 foldDown(unroll({urn:Test.Namespace,Root}.{urn:Test.Namespace,catalog}.{urn:Test.Namespace,book}),
	mapColumn(
		{@id} = {urn:Test.Namespace,Root}.{urn:Test.Namespace,catalog}.{urn:Test.Namespace,book}.{@id},
		{urn:Test.Namespace,author} = {urn:Test.Namespace,Root}.{urn:Test.Namespace,catalog}.{urn:Test.Namespace,book}.{urn:Test.Namespace,author},
		{urn:Test.Namespace,genre} = {urn:Test.Namespace,Root}.{urn:Test.Namespace,catalog}.{urn:Test.Namespace,book}.{urn:Test.Namespace,genre},
		{urn:Test.Namespace,price} = {urn:Test.Namespace,Root}.{urn:Test.Namespace,catalog}.{urn:Test.Namespace,book}.{urn:Test.Namespace,price},
		{urn:Test.Namespace,publish_date} = {urn:Test.Namespace,Root}.{urn:Test.Namespace,catalog}.{urn:Test.Namespace,book}.{urn:Test.Namespace,publish_date},
		{urn:Test.Namespace,title} = {urn:Test.Namespace,Root}.{urn:Test.Namespace,catalog}.{urn:Test.Namespace,book}.{urn:Test.Namespace,title}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ID as string,
		NAME as string,
		DEPT as string,
		STARTDATE as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['BooksXmldata'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		OrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		RequiredDate as timestamp,
		ShippedDate as timestamp,
		ShipVia as integer,
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		ShipName as string,
		ShipAddress as string,
		ShipCity as string,
		ShipRegion as string,
		ShipPostalCode as string,
		ShipCountry as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 split(EmployeeID>=1 && EmployeeID<=3,
	EmployeeID>=4 && EmployeeID<=6,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Group1, Group2, Group3)
ConditionalSplit1@Group1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	stageInsert: true) ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@Group2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	stageInsert: true) ~> sink2
ConditionalSplit1@Group3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	stageInsert: true) ~> sink3

source(output(
		OrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		RequiredDate as timestamp,
		ShippedDate as timestamp,
		ShipVia as integer,
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		ShipName as string,
		ShipAddress as string,
		ShipCity as string,
		ShipRegion as string,
		ShipPostalCode as string,
		ShipCountry as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Orders
source(output(
		EmployeeID as integer,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		Title as string,
		TitleOfCourtesy as string,
		BirthDate as timestamp,
		HireDate as timestamp,
		Address as string,
		City as string,
		Region as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		Country as string,
		HomePhone as string,
		Extension as string,
		Notes as string,
		ReportsTo as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> EmpLkpTable
Orders, EmpLkpTable lookup(Orders@EmployeeID == EmpLkpTable@EmployeeID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'last',
	asc(EmpLkpTable@EmployeeID, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 select(mapColumn(
		OrderID,
		CustomerID,
		EmployeeID = Orders@EmployeeID,
		OrderDate,
		RequiredDate,
		ShippedDate,
		ShipVia,
		Freight,
		ShipName,
		ShipAddress,
		ShipCity,
		ShipRegion,
		ShipPostalCode,
		ShipCountry,
		LastName,
		FirstName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		RevisionNumber as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		DueDate as timestamp,
		ShipDate as timestamp,
		Status as integer,
		OnlineOrderFlag as boolean,
		SalesOrderNumber as string,
		PurchaseOrderNumber as string,
		AccountNumber as string,
		CustomerID as integer,
		ShipToAddressID as integer,
		BillToAddressID as integer,
		ShipMethod as string,
		CreditCardApprovalCode as string,
		SubTotal as decimal(19,4),
		TaxAmt as decimal(19,4),
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		TotalDue as decimal(19,4),
		Comment as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source1
source1 derive(Year = year(OrderDate),
		Month = month(OrderDate)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 aggregate(groupBy(CustomerID,
		Year,
		Month),
	TotalSales = sum(SubTotal)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 keyGenerate(output(SID as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		OrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		RequiredDate as timestamp,
		ShippedDate as timestamp,
		ShipVia as integer,
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		ShipName as string,
		ShipAddress as string,
		ShipCity as string,
		ShipRegion as string,
		ShipPostalCode as string,
		ShipCountry as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 derive(EmpGroup = case(

    EmployeeID>=1 && EmployeeID<=3,'Group1',
    EmployeeID>=4 && EmployeeID<=6,'Group2',

    'Group3'

)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
